TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BehaviorEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class BehaviorEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供編輯器控制項，讓使用者編輯相關聯 控制項上的數個使用者介面 (UI) 屬性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別是衍生自編輯器控制項類別，並會用來編輯影響行為的相關聯的屬性或控制項。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the behavior of an associated or control. 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀)、 有工具導向組件控制項 （工具組件），且每個工具組件必須位在特定類型的工具區域。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 組件控制項集合中的工具組件具有兩個特殊的特性：Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它們是協助程式控制項，可讓使用者個人化的 Web 組件頁面上的控制項。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它們只會顯示在特定顯示模式。They are visible only in certain display modes. 控制項是變成可見的只有在 Web 組件頁面處於編輯模式，且特定的工具組件控制項所選取來編輯。The control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控制項，如同所有其他控制項，位於控制項。The control, like all other controls, resides in an control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 只能包含區域控制項，和控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 在頁面上，在某些情況下不顯示控制項。The control is not displayed on the page under certain conditions. 如果上的屬性值正在編輯的控制項是`true`，頁面位於使用者個人化範圍 （也就是預設值），不顯示控制項。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 針對控制要顯示在此案例中，通常您需要遵循兩個步驟：For the control to be displayed in this scenario, typically you would need to follow two steps: - 項目加入 Web.config 檔案，以提供授權的使用者權限，若要編輯共用個人化範圍 （亦即使用者所做的變更將會對應用程式的所有使用者顯示） 中的網頁。Add an entry to the Web.config file that gives an authorized user permission to edit Web pages in shared personalization scope (which means that the changes the user makes will be visible to all users of the application). - 以程式設計方式變更的頁面從共用層級的使用者層級的個人化範圍在執行階段，例如使用方法。Programmatically change the page from user-level to shared-level personalization scope at run time, for example by using the method. 如需如何進行的範例控制項顯示在頁面中，請參閱本主題的範例 > 一節。For an example of how to make the control visible in a page, see the Example section of this topic. 如需有關共用的控制項和個人化範圍的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about shared controls and personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). 類別也有重要的方法，它繼承自類別並覆寫。The class also has an important method, , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法很重要，因為它可讓您取得的屬性值控制所編輯，並將它們指派給編輯控制項的欄位。The method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the control being edited and assigning them to the fields of the editing control. 在大部分情況下，控制項應該用頁面保存格式，藉由宣告``內的項目``項目，依序包含``網頁上的項目。In most cases, the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 控制項可讓使用者編輯的下列 UI 屬性控制項：The control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a control: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 若要編輯其他屬性和行為控制項，您可以使用其他Web 組件控制集所提供的控制項。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 這些控制項包括，則，和控制項。These controls include the , the , and the control. 所提供控制項應該提供編輯所需的編輯功能大部分控制項，但是您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自類別。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a code example, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善協助工具，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組相關之控制項集合中用來在編輯控制項，以及它可協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如，一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向的使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記，也可能不符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告控制項在網頁上，並加以編輯的數個 UI 屬性啟用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含網頁控制項和控制項，這用來編輯的行為屬性控制項。A Web page that contains an control and a control, which is used to edit the behavior properties of a control. - 要在 Web.config 檔案中提供的授權的使用者權限，來編輯共用個人化範圍中的網頁項目。An entry to make in the Web.config file to give an authorized user permission to edit the page in shared personalization scope. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 這個使用者控制項的文件說明如何呼叫方法，將頁面切換為共用模式，可讓控制項才會出現。The documentation for this user control explains how to call the method to switch the page into shared mode, which enables the control to appear. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的宣告式參考控制項，且具有子系``元素，其中包含宣告式參考控制項。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to a control. 請注意，這個頁面也包含因為這個控制項所在的繫結至 Pubs 資料庫中; 控制項，可做為函式可以編輯的控制項控制項。Note that the page also contains a control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a , it is able to function as a control that can be edited by the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 此範例的第三個部分是 Web.config 檔案中的項目。The third part of the example is an entry in the Web.config file. 您必須進行的項目，如下所示在``區段的檔案，以啟用授權的使用者或一組使用者來編輯網頁，在共用個人化範圍。You must make an entry like the following in the `` section of the file, to enable an authorized user or set of users to edit the Web page when it is in shared personalization scope. 此項目，是重要的步驟。否則，控制項將不會顯示當您切換到編輯模式的頁面。This entry is a critical step; otherwise, the control will not be visible when you switch the page into edit mode. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 當您載入瀏覽器的頁面時，可以先選取**Shared**選項**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can first select the **Shared** option on the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 接下來，按一下下拉式清單，然後選取**編輯模式**頁面切換到編輯模式。Next, click the drop-down list itself, and select **Edit Mode** to switch the page into edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下**編輯**來開始編輯。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 編輯 UI 顯示時，您可以看到控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字的方塊。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 如果您進行一些變更編輯 UI 並按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單控制項。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public BehaviorEditorPart ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: BehaviorEditorPart();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 建立類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值; 沒有建構函式中宣告類別，因此不特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. 通常您不需要使用建構函式，因為您可以加入控制項以宣告方式在設計階段的頁面。Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a control to a page declaratively at design time. 不過，如果您要新增控制項以程式設計方式基於某些原因，您可以使用建構函式。However, if you need to add a control programmatically for some reason, you can use the constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 將值從 控制項儲存至相關聯 控制項中相應的屬性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果將值從 控制項儲存至 控制項的動作順利進行，則為 ，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個重要的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 方法的目的是要儲存的使用者已設定的值控制項中相關聯的對應屬性控制項。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 在參考相關聯的控制項控制項的繼承屬性。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. 方法會嘗試設定使用者介面 (UI) 的數目-相關上相關聯的屬性值控制項。The method attempts to set a number of user interface (UI)-related property values on the associated control. 如需這個方法中所設定的屬性值的清單，請參閱中的 < 備註 >類別概觀。For a list of the property values that are set in this method, see the Remarks in the class overview. 時使用者按下 [確定] 的動詞命令或套用動詞命令在編輯 UI 會呼叫方法。The method is called when the user clicks an OK verb or an apply verb in the editing UI.

exception.span: 嘗試為相關聯 控制項上的屬性設定值時發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when trying to set the value for a property on the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }

Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String

member this.DefaultButton : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項上預設按鈕的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the default button on the control.

value.span: 包含預設按鈕 ID 的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫屬性上設定數個屬性的基底屬性。The property overrides the base property to set several attributes on the property. 屬性不能與佈景主題，並無法使用的設計階段使用者介面 (UI) 瀏覽。The property cannot be used with themes, and it cannot be browsed with a design-time user interface (UI). 從 基底屬性值，擷取屬性的值。The value of the property is retrieved from the base property value. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的值`true`，亦即，將顯示控制項，除非在其中一種情況。The property returns a value of `true`, meaning that the control will be displayed, except in one case. 如果上的屬性值正在編輯的控制項是`true`，頁面位於使用者個人化範圍 （也就是預設值），不顯示控制項。If the property value on the control being edited is `true`, and the page is in user personalization scope (which is the default), the control is not displayed. 所需的步驟，說明和示範如何產生程式碼範例控制項顯示供編輯，請參閱類別的概觀和程式碼範例。For an explanation of the steps required, and a code example that shows how to cause the control to be displayed for editing, see the class overview and code example. Web 組件控制集的設計是共用控制項，假設所有使用者，都都看得到的控制項應該是只變更頁面共用個人化在範圍中時，編輯，也就是說，都會顯示所有使用者顯示供編輯。The Web Parts control set is designed with the assumption that shared controls--controls that are visible to all users--should be visible for editing only when a page is in shared personalization scope, meaning that the editing changes are visible to all users.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 擷取 控制項的屬性值，並將它們指派給相關聯的 控制項。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個重要的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 它會實作方法的基底類別，擷取目前的值從相關聯控制項，並更新中的控制項控制使用這些值，因此使用者可以編輯它們。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 方法會呼叫每次在相關聯的值控制項可能已變更。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 針對控制項，區域，其中包含控制項呼叫方法，以便中的值控制項永遠會同步處理在相關聯的值控制項。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 做為控制項標題的字串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 預設值是 Web 組件控制項集合所提供的計算控制項名稱。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 在頁面中宣告控制項時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來說明此控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列程式碼示範如何在設定標題以宣告方式在網頁上的控制項。The following code shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 在程式碼範例的下一個部分示範如何設定的值屬性以程式設計的方式。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/CS/behavioreditorpartcs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_BehaviorEditorPart_Overview/VB/behavioreditorpartvb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**切換到編輯模式下的下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 WebPart**控制項，然後按一下**編輯**來開始編輯。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 編輯 UI 顯示時，您可以看到控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字的方塊。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 請注意，標題控制項是在網頁上的宣告式標記指派給它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果您輸入一些文字在文字方塊旁**更新 EditorPart 標題**按鈕，然後在更新控制項，然後按一下 按鈕的標題。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
